response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth considering. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $14,000. This price reflects its high quality and the significant benefit it will bring to you. I'm confident it's a fair offer that maximizes value for both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 14000}
